SA10n1070:3: iha hi bhagavatā mahākaruṇopāya prajñādvayadhāriṇā sakalatraidhātukāśeṣasattvajātyādiduḥkhavyupaśamaikamanasā tribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyaiḥ saptabhirvā nairantaryakrameṇodyacchatā taistairniratiśayairativicitraiḥ puṇyakriyāprārambhaiḥ sakalajagaddhitodayaikakriyālakṣaṇaiḥ priyaikaputrādapyadhikataraniravaśeṣajagadanugrahatatpareṇa mahākaruṇāparavaśena tatratatropapattyāyatane kṣitisalilajvalanapavanasādhāraṇabhaiṣajyamahāmahīruhavajjanānāṃ svecchāta upabhogyatāmātmānamupagamayatā mahākālena sārvajñaṃ sarvākāraparicchedi padamadhigatam |
SA10n1070:4: sa evamadhigatasarvajñajñāno bhagavān yathā dharmāṇāṃ tattvaṃ vyavasthitaṃ tathaiva aśeṣato gatatvād buddhatvāt tathāgata ityucyate |
SA10n1070:7: na hi ekena janmanā śakyaṃ tathāgatatvamanuprāptum |
SA10n1070:11: bhavadīyameva hi idamatimahadajñānaṃ bhavasaṃtānasya avicchedavartitāṃ ca atidīrghakālaṃ ca gamayati,
SA10n1070:12: yasya nāma bhavataḥ atimahadajñānadhanāndhakārameva vicitrairupapattiśaraccandrajñānālokairvidhvasyamānamapi aticiratarakālābhyāsavāsanā vistarābhivṛddhamadyāpi na vidhvasyate na nivartate |
SA10n1070:13: yadi hi tathāgato nāma kaścit syāt svabhāvataḥ,
SA10n1070:15: na ca tathāgato nāma kaścid bhāvasvabhāvata upalabhyate |
SA10n1070:16: kevalaṃ tu bhavānavidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā dvicandrakeśamaśakādivanmithyā tathāgataṃ nāma svabhāvata upalabhate |
SA10n1070:18: tathā pratipādayannāha - skandhā na nānyaḥ skandhebhyo nāsmin skandhā na teṣu saḥ |
SA10n1070:22: yadi hi tathāgato nāma kaścit padārtho'
SA10n1070:28: pūrvakā eva pañca skandhāḥ sattvaprajñaptinimittatvādiha vicāre parigṛhyante nottare,
SA10n1070:33: tathāgato vā skandhavān bhavet dhanavāniva devadattaḥ?
SA10n1070:36: tatra tāvat skandhā eva na tathāgataḥ |
SA10n1070:38: uktaṃ hi - yadindhanaṃ sa cedagnirekatvaṃ kartṛkarmaṇoḥ |
SA10n1070:62: uktaṃ caitanmadhyamakāvatāre pakṣadvayavyākhyānam - skandheṣvātmā vidyate naiva cāmī santi skandhā ātmanītīha yasmāt |
SA10n1070:63: satyanyatve syādiyaṃ kalpanā vai taccānyatvaṃ nāstyataḥ kalpanaiṣā ||
SA10n1070:65: tathā tatraivoktam - iṣṭo nātmā rūpavānnāsti yasmā - dātmā vattvārthopayogo hi nātaḥ |
SA10n1070:68: tattvānyatvapakṣe eva tu pañcāpi pakṣā antargatā vastutaḥ |
SA10n1070:69: satkāyadṛṣṭipravṛttyapekṣayā tu pañca pakṣāḥ samupavarṇyante ācāryeṇeti vijñeyam |
SA10n1070:70: yaścaivaṃ skandheṣu pañcadhā vicāryamāṇo nāsti tathāgataḥ,
SA10n1070:72: sarvathā na saṃbhavatyeva tathāgata iti bhāvasvabhāvādapaśyanta ācāryapādāḥ prāhuḥ - katamo'
SA10n1070:77: atraike vadanti - naiva hi skandhāstathāgata iti brūmaḥ,
SA10n1070:87: kiṃ tarhi skandhānamalānupādāya tattvānyatvādyavācyaṃ tathāgataṃ vyavasthāpayāmaḥ |
SA10n1070:89: atrocyate - buddhaḥ skandhānupādāya yadi nāsti svabhāvataḥ |
SA10n1070:90: svabhāvataśca yo nāsti kutaḥ sa parabhāvataḥ || 2 ||
SA10n1070:92: yadi hi buddho bhagavānamalān skandhānupādāya tattvānyatvenāvaktavyaḥ prajñapyate,
SA10n1070:96: yaśca idānīṃ svabhāvato nāsti ātmīyena svarūpeṇa,
SA10n1070:97: sa kathamavidyamānaḥ svabhāvataḥ skandhānupādāya parabhāvato bhaviṣyatīti?
SA10n1070:98: na hi avidyamāno vandhyātanayaḥ parabhāvamapekṣya bhavatīti yujyate || 2 ||
SA10n1070:100: atha syāt - yathaiva hi pratibimbakaṃ svabhāvato'
SA10n1070:104: saṃvidyamānaḥ anāsravān pañca skandhānupādāya parabhāvato bhaviṣyatīti,
SA10n1070:107: yaścānātmā sa ca kathaṃ bhaviṣyati tathāgataḥ || 3 ||
SA10n1070:109: yadi pratibimbavat parabhāvaṃ pratītya tathāgataḥ iṣyate,
SA10n1070:118: kiṃ cānyat - iha yadi tathāgatasya kaścit svabhāvaḥ syāt,
SA10n1070:119: tadā tatsvabhāvāpekṣayā skandhasvabhāvaḥ parabhāva iti syāt,
SA10n1070:120: taṃ ca parabhāvaṃ pratītya tathāgataḥ syāt |
SA10n1070:121: yadā tu tathāgatasya svabhāva eva nāsti ,
SA10n1070:122: tadā kutaḥ skandhānāṃ paratvaṃ syāditi pratipādayannāha - yadi nāsti svabhāvaśca parabhāvaḥ kathaṃ bhavet |
SA10n1070:136: yadi manyase - skandhebhyastattvānyatvena avaktavyastathāgataḥ skandhānupādāya prajñapyate iti,
SA10n1070:138: yadi skandhānanupādāya agṛhītvā pūrvaṃ kaścittathāgato nāma bhavet,
SA10n1070:140: vyatirikta eva hi pūrvasiddho dhanād devadatto dhanasyopādānaṃ kurute,
SA10n1070:141: tadvadetān skandhānanupādāya yadi kaścit tathāgataḥ syāt,
SA10n1070:151: tadā skandhānupādāya tathāgato nāma bhaviṣyatīti nopapadyate || 6 ||
SA10n1070:153: yadā caivaṃ tathāgataḥ upādānātpūrvamavidyamānatvāt na kiṃcidupādatte,
SA10n1070:154: tadā tadupādānasyāpi kenacidapi anupādīyamānasya upādānatvaṃ na saṃbhavatyeveti pratipādayannāha - na bhavatyanupādattamupādānaṃ ca kiṃcana |
SA10n1070:156: tadā upādānābhāvādupādātāpi kaścinnāstīti pratipādayannāha - na cāsti nirupādānaḥ kathaṃcana tathāgataḥ || 7 ||
SA10n1070:160: tadevaṃ yathopapāditanyāyena - tattvānyatvena yo nāsti mṛgyamāṇaśca pañcadhā |
SA10n1070:163: yo hi tathāgato vicāryamāṇo mṛgyamāṇaḥ tattvenaskandhebhya ekatvena nāsti,
SA10n1070:164: anyatvena skandhebhyaḥ pṛthaktvena ca yo nāsti,
SA10n1070:170: na kevalamanena vicāreṇa tathāgata eva nāsti,
SA10n1070:176: athāpi syāt - yadyapi svabhāvataḥ upādānaṃ nāsti,
SA10n1070:178: tadāpi nopapadyate iti pratipādayannāha - svabhāvataśca yannāsti kutastatparabhāvataḥ || 9 ||
SA10n1070:185: atha yadyapi upādātṛnirapekṣamupādānaṃ svabhāvasiddhaṃ na saṃbhavati,
SA10n1070:193: idānīṃ yathāprasādhitamevārthamupadarśayannāha - evaṃ śūnyamupādānamupādātā ca sarvaśaḥ |
SA10n1070:196: tenedānīmupādānena - prajñapyate ca śūnyena kathaṃ śūnyastathāgataḥ || 10 ||
SA10n1070:198: naiva tatsaṃbhavati yadavidyamānena avidyamānasya tathāgatasya prajñaptiḥ syāditi |
SA10n1070:199: tasmāt skandhānupādāya tathāgataḥ prajñapyate iti nopapadyate ||
SA10n1070:200: atrāhuḥ - aho vata hatā pratyāśā asmākam,
SA10n1070:201: ye hi nāma vayaṃ svavikalpavikalpitā tikaṭhinakudarśanamālutālatājālāvabaddheṣu nirvāṇapuragāmyaviparītamārgagamanaparibhraṣṭeṣu anatikrāntasaṃsārāṭavīkāntāradurgeṣu kaṇabhakṣākṣapādadigambarajaimininaiyāyikaprabhṛtiṣu tīrthakareṣu aviparīta svargāpavargamārgopadeśābhimāniṣu spṛhāṃ parityajya niravaśeṣānyatīrthyamatāndhakāropaghātakaṃ svargāpavargānugāmyaviparītamārgasaṃprakāśakaṃ saddharmadeśanātipaṭutarakiraṇavyāptāśeṣāśāmukhaṃ vividhavineya janamatikamalakuṅmalavibodhanatatparaṃ yathāvadavasthitapadārthatattvārthabhājanānāmamalaikacakṣurbhūtaṃ sakala jagaccharaṇyabhūtamadvitīyaṃ daśabalavaiśāradyāveṇikabuddhadharmāmalamaṇḍalaṃ mahāyānamahānayasārathivaraṃ sapta bodhyaṅgottuṅgaturaṃgapadātiyojitaṃ sakalatribhuvanajanajātijarāmaraṇasaṃsārakāntārasariducchoṣaṇatatparaṃ caturasamamārārātisamaraśarasaṃpātavijayinaṃ sakalajagadasadgrāharāhugrahavigrahodgrahanirāsinaṃ tathāgata savitāramajñānadhanagahanāndhakāranirākaraṇāya mokṣārthino'
SA10n1070:203: tasya ca tvayā - evaṃ śūnyamupādānamupādātā ca sarvaśaḥ |
SA10n1070:206: sattvaṃ vruvatā bhavatā hatā asmākaṃ mokṣapratyāśā anuttarasamyaksaṃbodhyāgamā bhilāṣaḥ iti |
SA10n1070:207: tadalaṃ bhavatā tathāgatamahādityapracchādakena ākālikadhanadhanāvalīvisaraṇena jagadandha kāropameneti |
SA10n1070:209: asmākameva hatā pratyāśā bhavadvidheṣvabudhajaneṣu ye hi nāma bhavantaḥ mokṣakāmatayā anyatīrthyamatāni parityajya bhagavantaṃ tathāgatamapi aviparītaṃ paramaśāstāraṃ pratipadya paramagambhīra manuttaraṃ sarvatīrthyavādāsādhāraṇaṃ nairātmyasiṃhanādamasahamānāḥ kuraṅgamā iva svādhimuktidaridratayā vividhakudṛṣṭivyālamālākulaṃ viparyastajanānuyātaṃ tameva mahāghorasaṃsārāṭavīkāntāracārakānugamārgamavagāhante |
SA10n1070:210: na hi tathāgatāḥ kadācidapyātmanaḥ skandhānāṃ vā astitvaṃ prajñapayanti |
SA10n1070:215: tathā- dharma svabhāvatu śūnya vivikto bodhi svabhāvatu śūnya viviktā |
SA10n1070:216: yo hi caretsa pi śūnyasvabhāvo jñānavato na tu bālajanasya ||
SA10n1070:218: na ca vayaṃ sarvathaiva niṣprapañcānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ nāstitvaṃ brūmaḥ,
SA10n1070:222: niḥsvabhāvaṃ hi tathāgataṃ vyācakṣāṇena aviparītārthābhidhitsunā yogināṃ satā sarvathā - śūnyamiti na vaktavyamaśūnyamiti vā bhavet |
SA10n1070:224: kiṃ tu anukte yathāvadavasthitaṃ svabhāvaṃ pratipattā pratipattuṃ na samartha ityato vayamapi āropato vyavahārasatye eva sthitvā vyavahārārthaṃ vineyajanānurodhena śūnyamityapi brūmaḥ,
SA10n1070:236: anyatra aśūnyamuktam - atītaṃ cedbhikṣavo rūpaṃ nābhaviṣyanna śrutavānāryaśrāvako'
SA10n1070:241: evaṃ yāvat atītaṃ cedbhikṣavo vijñānaṃ nābhaviṣyat - ityādi pūrvavat ||
SA10n1070:249: na śūnyaṃ nāpi cāśūnyaṃ tasmātsarvaṃ vidhīyate |
SA10n1070:254: yathoktaṃ sūtre - māyopamaṃ jagadidaṃ bhavatā naṭaraṅgasvapnasadṛśaṃ vihitam |
SA10n1070:255: nātmā na sattva na ca jīvagatī dharmā marīcidakacandrasamāḥ ||
SA10n1070:261: rathacakravad bhramati sarvajagat tiryakṣu pretanirayeṣu gatāḥ |
SA10n1070:262: mūḍhā adeśika anāthagatāḥ teṣāṃ pradarśayasi mārgavaram ||
SA10n1070:264: sarvāstvetāḥ kalpanā niṣprapañce tathāgate na saṃbhavanti || 11 ||
SA10n1070:266: na ca kevalaṃ śūnyatvādikameva catuṣṭayaṃ tathāgate na saṃbhavati,
SA10n1070:267: api ca - śāśvatāśāśvatādyā kutaḥ śānte catuṣṭayam |
SA10n1070:283: bhavati ca na bhavati ca tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt,
SA10n1070:284: naiva bhavati na na bhavati ca tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt,
SA10n1070:289: tatra yathopavarṇitena nyāyena yathā śūnyatvādikaṃ catuṣṭayaṃ prakṛtyā śānte niḥsvabhāve tathāgate na saṃbhavati,
SA10n1070:290: evaṃ śāśvatāśāśvatādika mapi catuṣṭayamatra na saṃbhavati |
SA10n1070:291: asaṃbhavādeva ca catuṣṭayaṃ vandhyāputrasya śyāmagauratvādivat na vyākṛtaṃ bhagavatā lokasya |
SA10n1070:292: yathā ca etaccatuṣṭayaṃ tathāgate na saṃbhavati,
SA10n1070:295: idānīṃ bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt ityādikasyāpi kalpanācatuṣṭayasya pravṛttyasaṃbhava mudbhāvayannāha - yena grāho gṛhītastu ghano'
SA10n1070:299: yena hi ghanataro mahatābhiniveśena asti tathāgataḥ iti grāho gṛhītaḥ,
SA10n1070:309: yasya tu na kasyāṃcidapyavasthāyāṃ svabhāvaśūnyatvāt tathāgatasya astitvanāstitvam,
SA10n1070:312: paraṃ nirodhādbhavati buddho na bhavatīti vā || 14 ||
SA10n1070:316: tadevaṃ prakṛtiśānte niḥsvabhāve tathāgate sarvaprapañcātīte mandabuddhitayā śāśvatāśāśvatā dikayā nityānityāstināstiśūnyāśūnyasarvajñāsarvajñādikayā kalpanayā - prapañcayanti ye buddhaṃ prapañcātītamavyayam |
SA10n1070:317: te prapañcahatāḥ sarve na paśyanti tathāgatam || 15 ||
SA10n1070:324: tamitthaṃvidhaṃ tathāgataṃ svotprekṣitamithyāparikalpamalamalinamānasatayā vividhairabhūtaiḥ parikalpaviśeṣaiḥ ye buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ prapañcayanti,
SA10n1070:326: tataśca śavabhūtāḥ etasmin pravacane na paśyanti tathāgataṃ jātyandhā ivādityam |
SA10n1070:327: ata evāha bhagavān - ye māṃ rūpeṇa adrākṣurye māṃ ghoṣeṇa anvayuḥ |
SA10n1070:328: mithyāprahāṇaprasṛtā na māṃ drakṣyanti te janāḥ ||
SA10n1070:329: dharmato buddhā draṣṭavyā dharmakāyā hi nāyakāḥ |
SA10n1070:330: dharmatā cāpyavijñeyā na sā śakyā vijānitum ||
SA10n1070:333: tadatra tathāgataparīkṣāyāṃ sattvalokaḥ sakalaḥ sasurāsuranarādiḥ parīkṣitaḥ |
SA10n1070:335: tathā bhājanalokasyāpi vāyumaṇḍalāderakaniṣṭhavitānabhavanaparyantasya naiḥsvābhāvyamudbhāvayannāha - tathāgato yatsvabhāvastatsvabhāvamidaṃ jagat |
SA10n1070:337: kiṃsvabhāvastathāgataḥ punarityāha - tathāgato niḥsvabhāvo niḥsvabhāvamidaṃ jagat || 16 ||
SA10n1070:342: ata evoktaṃ sūtre - anupādadharmaḥ satataṃ tathāgataḥ sarve ca dharmāḥ sugatena sādṛśāḥ |
SA10n1070:343: nimittagrāheṇa tu bālabuddhayaḥ asatsu dharmeṣu caranti loke ||
SA10n1070:344: tathāgato hi pratibimbabhūtaḥ kuśalasya dharmasya anāsravasya |
SA10n1070:346: sti bimbaṃ ca saṃdṛśyati sarva loke ||
SA10n1070:348: uktaṃ ca bhagavatyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām - atha khalu te devaputrāḥ āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocan - kiṃ punarāryasubhūte māyopamāste sattvāḥ, na te māyā?
SA10n1070:349: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtistān devaputrānetadavocat -māyo- pamāste devaputrāḥ sattvāḥ,
SA10n1070:351: iti hi māyā ca sattvāśca advayameta dadvaidhīkāram |
SA10n1070:368: atha khalu devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocan - samyaksaṃbuddho'
SA10n1070:371: subhūtirāha - nirvāṇamapi devaputrā māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadāmi,
SA10n1070:373: devaputrā āhuḥ - nirvāṇamapyāryasubhūte māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadasi?
SA10n1070:374: subhūtirāha - yadyapi devaputrā nirvāṇādapyanyaḥ kaściddharmo viśiṣṭataraḥ syāt,
SA10n1070:376: iti hi māyā ca nirvāṇaṃ ca advayametadadvaidhīkāramiti ||
SA10n1070:377: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau tathāgataparīkṣā nāma dvāviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam ||
